InstructionData.Title: Master Slave
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: ​ alias Master d0​ alias Slave1 d1​ alias Slave2 d2​ alias Slave3 d3​ ​ alias onoff r0​ alias mode r1​ ​ start:​ yield​ l onoff Master On​ l mode Master Mode​ ​ s Slave1 On onoff​ s Slave2 On onoff​ s Slave3 On onoff​ ​ s Slave1 Mode mode​ s Slave2 Mode mode​ s Slave3 Mode mode​ j start
